name: Summation Batch Load File
summary: Learn about .DII files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Image files that are supported by DII files include eDocs and scanned papers that have been processed with Optical Character Recognition (OCR).

description: ASCII text file formatted using a non-delimited, multiple line format; used by a Summation Core Database to establish the link between the database summaries and the associated image file.
